name: identifier-lookup
label: Identifier Lookup
description: Gear to look up participant identifiers for incoming data and capture visit events when QC logging is enabled
author: NACC

input_file.description: The CSV input file. Requires participant ID that matches mapping direction.

form_configs_file.description: A JSON file with forms module configurations; required for the nacc direction

dry_run.description: Whether to do a dry run

database_mode.description: Whether to lookup identifiers from dev or prod database

apikey_path_prefix.description: The instance specific AWS parameter gearbot path prefix

direction.description: Direction of identifier mapping; 'nacc' to naccid, or 'center' to center

preserve_case.description: Whether or not to preserve the case of the header keys in the input file

event_environment.description: Environment for visit event capture (prod or dev); only required when using nacc direction with form configs

event_bucket.description: S3 bucket name for event capture; only required when using nacc direction with form configs

module.description: Module name for form processing (optional, can be inferred from filename)

single_center.description: Whether the gear is being run in a pipeline for a single center (enables center validation)
